evidence.claim: Care Impact uses AWS services which are HIPAA-compliant for their data storage and processing needs.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration with EHRs follows HL7 messaging protocols as indicated in their developer documentation.
Care Impact implements secure integration patterns to adhere to HIPAA compliance.
They utilize Azure for identity management and SQL databases for storing health data.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards for healthcare data exchange and APIs for automation.
matched_use_cases: Clearinghouse functionalities in healthcare data exchange
